FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue1.label: Financing Receivable, Percent Past Due
FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue1.description: Percentage of financing receivable balance that is past due.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Research and Development, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible research and development expense.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsResearc.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsResearc.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

PreferredStockCapitalSharesReservedForFu.label: Preferred Stock, Capital Shares Reserved for Future Issuance
PreferredStockCapitalSharesReservedForFu.description: Aggregate number of nonredeemable preferred shares reserved for future issuance.

PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share
PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

PreferredUnitsOutstanding.label: Preferred Units, Outstanding
PreferredUnitsOutstanding.description: The number of preferred units outstanding.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

SecuredDebtCurrent.label: Secured Debt, Current
SecuredDebtCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AssetsNoncurrent.label: Assets, Noncurrent
AssetsNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CapitalUnits.label: Capital Units, Value
CapitalUnits.description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

ContractualInterestExpenseOnPrepetitionL.label: Contractual Interest Expense on Prepetition Liabilities Not Recognized in Statement of Operations
ContractualInterestExpenseOnPrepetitionL.description: The amount of contractual interest expense on prepetition liabilities not included in the statement of operations.

DebtConversionOriginalDebtAmount1.label: Debt Conversion, Original Debt, Amount
DebtConversionOriginalDebtAmount1.description: "The amount of the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Net
DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Match
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage employer matches of the employee's percentage contribution matched.

DerivativeLiabilityMeasurementInput.label: Derivative Liability, Measurement Input
DerivativeLiabilityMeasurementInput.description: Value of input used to measure derivative liability.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

InvestmentsAndCash.label: Investments and Cash
InvestmentsAndCash.description: Sum of investments and unrestricted cash as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NoncashContributionExpense.label: Noncash Contribution Expense
NoncashContributionExpense.description: Noncash charitable contributions made by the entity during the period.

OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Other Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates, classified as other. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

PreferredUnitsIssued.label: Preferred Units, Issued
PreferredUnitsIssued.description: The number of preferred units issued.

RedemptionPremium.label: Redemption Premium
RedemptionPremium.description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Additional Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Available for Grant
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The difference between the maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) authorized for issuance under the plan (including the effects of amendments and adjustments), and the sum of: 1) the number of shares (or other type of equity) already issued upon exercise of options or other equity-based awards under the plan; and 2) shares (or other type of equity) reserved for issuance on granting of outstanding awards, net of cancellations and forfeitures, if applicable.

StockDividendsShares.label: Stock Dividends, Shares
StockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Bonuses
AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: OCI, Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss), Arising During Period, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.label: Prepayment Fees on Advances, Net
PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.description: Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCo.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Common, Fair Value
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCo.description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Dividends in Excess of Retained Earnings
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The combined weighted average of the accumulated differences between the fair values on underlying shares and exercises prices to acquire such shares as of the grant date on options that were either forfeited or lapsed.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockSplits.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Stock Splits
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockSplits.description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of a stock split.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

AccruedSalariesCurrent.label: Accrued Salaries, Current
AccruedSalariesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals, classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.label: Issuance of Stock and Warrants for Services or Claims
IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.description: Fair value of share-based compensation granted to nonemployees as payment for services rendered or acknowledged claims.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

EscrowDeposit.label: Escrow Deposit
EscrowDeposit.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.
